1.details: Review specification and determine integration approach with existing ISSB Portal infrastructure. Focus on database schema design, component architecture, and seamless integration with existing volunteer management and communication systems.

2.content: Design Database Schema for Events & Gamification
2.details: Create comprehensive database schema including: events table (title, description, date, location, capacity), photo_galleries table (title, description, cover image), photos table (gallery references, image URLs, captions), badges table (achievement criteria, icon, description), member_badges table (achievement tracking), contests table (sponsor integration, dates, rules), contest_submissions table (member content). All additive design with proper foreign key relationships to existing profiles table.

3.details: Create edge functions for: events CRUD (list/create/update/delete), photo galleries CRUD, photos upload/management, badges CRUD and member assignment, contests CRUD and submissions, winner selection. Implement proper role-based access control (admin-only for management, member access for viewing/participation). Include file upload handling for images.

4.details: Create comprehensive admin interface for event management including: event list with filtering/pagination, rich event creation form (title, description, date, location, capacity), event editing capabilities, publish/unpublish workflow. Integrate with existing admin navigation structure.

5.details: Create admin interface for gallery management including: gallery list and creation, photo upload with drag-drop interface, image organization and captioning, gallery publishing controls, moderation tools for content management. Include secure file upload to Supabase Storage.

6.details: Create badge management interface including: badge list and creation, achievement criteria configuration (volunteer hours, event participation, etc.), badge icon upload, member badge assignment interface, achievement tracking and analytics.

7.details: Create comprehensive contest management including: contest creation with sponsor branding, rules and prize configuration, submission review interface, winner selection tools, contest lifecycle management (draft/published/active/ended). Include sponsor logo integration and legal compliance features.

8.details: Create member-facing interfaces including: events browsing page with registration, personal achievement display with progress tracking, contest submission interface, photo gallery viewing with social features. Integrate with existing member dashboard as new tabs.

9.details: Create automated badge awarding system based on member activities: volunteer hours thresholds, event participation, contest submissions, milestone achievements. Include notification system for unlocked achievements and progress tracking.

10.details: Build admin dashboard showing: event attendance metrics, badge achievement rates, gallery engagement stats, contest participation data, member engagement trends. Include visual charts and export capabilities.

11.details: Implement WCAG 2.1 AA standards across all new interfaces including: semantic HTML, ARIA attributes, keyboard navigation, color contrast compliance, form labels, screen reader compatibility, focus management for modals. Test all features with assistive technologies.

12.details: Deploy all backend functions to Supabase, build and deploy frontend changes, create comprehensive test data (events, galleries, badges, contests), verify integration with existing volunteer and announcement systems, test all admin and member workflows, ensure backward compatibility.
